title: omega squad teemo not going on sale?
body: Like many of the new skins rito usually chucks them up at a discounted price, how come omega squad teemo doesnt get a discount or is it like the firecracker jinx skin where they forgot to put a discount on it then later did?

replies.body: all i want is an omega squad rengar that looks like the alien off of the predator movies, riot do this plz
because its teemo, he has so many skins and doesnt deserve to be on sale

This is really stupid. Two posts on the forums about a sale for a Legendary skin that Riot clearly has said they don't go on sale and you also have all the other Legendary skins that haven't been on sale to show you they don't go on sale.
1820 skins never get discounted in store upon release
im pretty sure dunkmaster darius went up for 1350 on release for like 3 days
